Please learn more about satoshi. That how many satoshis  in one btc .. 1 Satoshi= 0.00000001 ฿ 100,000 Satoshi= 0.00100000 ฿ 1,000,000 Satoshi= 0.01000000 ฿ 10,000,000 Satoshi= 0.10000000 ฿ 100,000,000 Satoshi= 1.00000000 ฿ $STRAT first target is 80K SAT so it should be .00080000
